description: A business that provide Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning services.

priceRange.description: The price range of the business, for example $$$.

branchOf.description: The larger organization that this local business is a branch of, if any. Not to be confused with (anatomical)branch.

openingHours.description: The general opening hours for a business. Opening hours can be specified as a weekly time range, starting with days, then times per day.

currenciesAccepted.description: The currency accepted (in ISO 4217 currency format).
